value.title: AZ-104: Implement and manage storage in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage storage accounts, data in Azure Storage, and Azure File and Blob storage. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Create an Azure Storage account with the correct options for your business needs.

images.title: Create an Azure Storage account

topItems.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload
topItems.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of disk storage options for virtual machine workloads. Identify the features of capabilities of each type to ensure your application performs optimally.

images.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data. Find out how to use access keys, to secure networks, and to use Advanced Threat Protection to proactively monitor your system.

images.title: Secure your Azure Storage account

topItems.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files
topItems.excerpt: Azure Files provides a cloud-based file share for storing and sharing files to applications. Whether it's an application hosted in Azure App Service, an Azure VM, or an on-premises app, Azure Files can store and share file access between one or more applications and systems in a secure and failure-resilient manner.

images.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files
Create an Azure Storage account

Create an Azure Storage account

value.title: Architect migration, business continuity, and disaster recovery in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to migrate resources to Azure, how to provide site recovery for your applications in Azure and on-premises, and how to your applications are available through service interruptions and changes in load.

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Site Recovery and Azure Database Migration Service.

images.title: Design your migration to Azure

topItems.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery

topItems.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

images.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
Design your migration to Azure

Design your migration to Azure

value.title: AZ-104: Monitor and back up Azure resources
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor resources by using Azure Monitor and implement backup and recover in Azure. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

images.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by collecting and analyzing diagnostic data
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate monitoring options for an Azure virtual machine (VM). Enable diagnostics to get data about your VM. View VM metrics and create an alert to monitor performance.

images.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by collecting and analyzing diagnostic data

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

images.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

value.title: Build great solutions with the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how to design and build secure, scalable, high-performing solutions in Azure using the pillars of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
topItems.excerpt: You want to build great things on Azure, but youâ€™re not sure exactly what that means. Using key principles throughout your architecture regardless of technology choice, can help you design, build, and continuously improve your architecture.

images.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework

value.title: Migrate virtual machines and apps using Azure Migrate
value.excerpt: The Virtual machine and app migration using Azure Migrate learning path gives you a step-by-step process to help you understand, set up, assess, and migrate virtual and physical servers, databases, applications, and virtual desktops from on-premises to the Azure infrastructure. Azure Migrate now includes fully integrated and optimized migration-specific tools previously available only in Azure Site Recovery.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Azure Migrate helps you realize the benefits of moving your on-premises VMware or Hyper-V server workloads to Azure infrastructure as a service (IaaS). Learn the process for migrating your workload agent-less, all within the hub.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration

topItems.title: Set up Azure Migrate for server migration
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to check your prerequisite configurations in Azure and in your VMware vSphere environment and then perform the initial steps in Azure Migrate to choose your assessment and migration tools.

images.title: Set up Azure Migrate for server migration

topItems.title: Discover and Assess your on-premises servers with Azure Migrate
topItems.excerpt: Explore the Azure Migrate tools for discovering and assessing your virtual machine servers. Learn how to install and configure a virtual machine appliance in your virtualization host infrastructure.

images.title: Discover and Assess your on-premises servers with Azure Migrate

topItems.title: Replicate and migrate virtual machine servers with Azure Migrate
topItems.excerpt: Learn the process for replicating, testing, and finally migrating your virtual machines into production.

images.title: Replicate and migrate virtual machine servers with Azure Migrate
Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration

value.title: Design your migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Site Recovery and Azure Database Migration Service.

images.title: Design your migration to Azure

value.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to handle infrastructure and service failure, recover from the loss of data, and recover from a disaster by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability

value.title: Move large amounts of data to the cloud by using Azure Data Box family
value.excerpt: Evaluate Azure Data Box family to import terabytes (TBs) of data from a local computer to Azure Blob storage. Order disks. Copy data to disks and return them. Verify that the data is uploaded to Azure.

images.title: Move large amounts of data to the cloud by using Azure Data Box family

value.title: Design your site recovery solution in Azure
value.excerpt: Protect your applications and data from disasters with a well-designed site recovery solution.

images.title: Design your site recovery solution in Azure

value.title: Discover and Assess your on-premises servers with Azure Migrate
value.excerpt: Explore the Azure Migrate tools for discovering and assessing your virtual machine servers. Learn how to install and configure a virtual machine appliance in your virtualization host infrastructure.

images.title: Discover and Assess your on-premises servers with Azure Migrate

value.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration
value.excerpt: Discover how Azure Migrate helps you realize the benefits of moving your on-premises VMware or Hyper-V server workloads to Azure infrastructure as a service (IaaS). Learn the process for migrating your workload agent-less, all within the hub.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration

value.title: Replicate and migrate virtual machine servers with Azure Migrate
value.excerpt: Learn the process for replicating, testing, and finally migrating your virtual machines into production.

images.title: Replicate and migrate virtual machine servers with Azure Migrate

value.title: Set up Azure Migrate for server migration
value.excerpt: Learn how to check your prerequisite configurations in Azure and in your VMware vSphere environment and then perform the initial steps in Azure Migrate to choose your assessment and migration tools.

images.title: Set up Azure Migrate for server migration

value.title: Migrate Cassandra workloads to Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Learners will be able to demonstrate the benefits and processes for moving a Cassandra database to the Azure Cosmos DB Cassandra API.

images.title: Migrate Cassandra workloads to Cosmos DB

value.title: Migrate on-premises workloads to Azure
value.excerpt: Enable VMs for replication by registering the Hyper-V host(s) to the Azure Migrate project. Configure Hyper-V VMs for replication, monitor, and run a test failover. After migration complete, migrated VMs should have security controls added.

images.title: Migrate on-premises workloads to Azure

value.title: Migrate on-premises MongoDB databases to Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Learners will be able to demonstrate the benefits and processes for moving a MongoDB database to the Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB API.

images.title: Migrate on-premises MongoDB databases to Cosmos DB

value.title: Migrate on-premises MySQL databases to Azure Database for MySQL
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn about the benefits of migrating MySQL workloads to Azure, you'll see how to create an Azure Database for MySQL instance, and learn how to migrate on-premises MySQL databases to Azure.

images.title: Migrate on-premises MySQL databases to Azure Database for MySQL

value.title: Migrate on-premises PostgreSQL databases to Azure Database for PostgreSQL
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn about the benefits of migrating PostgreSQL workloads to Azure, you'll see how to create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL instance and how to migrate on-premises PostgreSQL databases to Azure.

images.title: Migrate on-premises PostgreSQL databases to Azure Database for PostgreSQL

value.title: Migrate SAP workloads to Azure
value.excerpt: You will see the difference between one-step and two-step migration. Also, you will learn how the Software Update Manager (SUM) tool can be used to create shadow repositories and target databases.

images.title: Migrate SAP workloads to Azure

value.title: Migrate SQL Workloads to Azure Managed Instances
value.excerpt: Learners will be able to demonstrate the benefits and processes for moving a SQL Server database to an Azure SQL Database Managed Instance.

images.title: Migrate SQL Workloads to Azure Managed Instances

value.title: Migrate SQL Workloads to Azure SQL Databases
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn to demonstrate the benefits and processes for moving a SQL Server database to Azure SQL Database.

images.title: Migrate SQL Workloads to Azure SQL Databases

value.title: Migrate SQL workloads to Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learners will be able to demonstrate the benefits and processes for moving a SQL Server database to an Azure virtual machine.

images.title: Migrate SQL workloads to Azure virtual machines

value.title: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Choose an agentless Hyper-V migration approach. Create an Azure Migrate project, enable Azure AD permissions, prepare the on-premises environment, and deploy the Azure Migrate appliance. Your on-premises workloads are now ready for the actual migration.

images.title: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure
